BattleEffectText.Name: The Bonds That Bind Us
BattleEffectText.Desc: Activates related passive ability and can be spent to enhance unique combat page. One stack is lost when staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Unstable Entropy
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain Haste equal to stacks of Erosion. If the character starts a Scene with more than 3 Erosion inflict 1 Erosion on all other allies.
